array.string: Drink a glass of water first thing in the morning
Park as far away as you can from the entrance
Write down everything on your mind before going to bed
Spend 15 minutes at the end of the week on a quick check up
Have a to-do list for the day and update it first thing in the morning
Check in with a frind or sibling every day
Pause before you answer to people
Stop and say hi to your neighbor
Keep ypur bike out where you can see it
Leave your credit card home when window shopping
